title: Drawing, View of the Back of a Dwelling in Polling, Bavaria, 1876
title_raw: View of the Back of a Dwelling in Polling, Bavaria
signed: Lower left in graphite: Walter Shirlaw NA . Verso: in graphite at left: Walter Shirlaw, Esq.
inscribed:
Lower left in graphite: Polling 76 - Sketched from / Nature - Germany / [signature]
Verso: top center in pen and black ink: 80 [encircled]
description: Tonal drawing of a two storied rustic building with two windows, wooden canopy over a small door and a small tresle table containing wooden barrels and an earthenware jug. A tree is sketched at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, View of the Back of a Dwelling in Polling, Bavaria, 1876. Graphite on cream wove paper. 
1912-16-46
